about-page: Welcome to the best service center for
about-text: Construction company «Ventstroy» has been successfully operating in the market since 2008. The company is engaged in manufacture, installation of ventilation systems and installation of ventilation equipment, manufacture of galvanized and roofing steel parts.
choose-quality-text: The successful activity of LLC «Ventstroy» from the beginning of its formation to the present day speaks of the high quality of the work performed and services to provide buildings with ventilation and air conditioning systems
choose-auto-text: «Ventstroy» company has its own fleet of trucks for cargo transportation from ducts, equipment and systems.
choose-support-text: «Ventstroy» provides high-quality service of equipment and ventilation systems. If our client has any problems and any request, we are always happy to help.
choose-price-text: Exclusive partner conditions in leading manufacturers allow us to keep the lowest prices on our products
choose-workshop-text: «Ventstroy» company has its own modern workshop with necessary equipment for manufacturing and installation of ventilation systems, ducts of any cross-section and galvanized steel parts
choose-time-text: Thanks to the use of modern innovative equipment in operation, it was possible to reduce the time of manufacture of ducts and molded parts, which is the main part of the system.
services-one-un: Manufacturing and installation of ducts is one of our main activities.
services-two-un: We carry out installation and adjustment works of the supply plants, ducts and a complete ventilation system.
services-three: Manufacture and installation of ventilation systems
services-three-un: Our company offers services in the design and installation of ventilation systems.
services-four: Manufacture and installation of parts from oc steel
services-four-un: Prices for any galvanized products vary depending on the volume of your order and will pleasantly surprise you with the minimum values.
about-workshop-value: «Ventstroy» company has its own modern workshop with necessary equipment for manufacturing and installation of ventilation systems, ducts of any cross-section and galvanized steel parts
about-fleet-value: «Ventstroy» company has its own fleet of trucks for cargo transportation from ducts, equipment and systems.
